title: Bug 115960 - Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
description: When retrieving datetime values from a table, the dynamic text item and data/text item display the datetime values in different formats.
OB: The dynamic text item and data/text item display datetime values differently when retrieving them from a table.
EB: Both the dynamic text item and data/text item should display datetime values in the same format when retrieved from a table.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Insert a text item, a data item, and a dynamic text item.
2. Set the content of all three items as 'new Date()'.
3. Save and preview the page.

Expected Result:
The dynamic text item, data item, and text item should all display the same formatted datetime value when retrieved from the table.

Actual Result:
The data and text item display the datetime value in the same format, but the dynamic text item displays it in a different format.
